name.ch: 慢性疾病之分子調控機轉

department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系系統生物與生物資訊碩士班
department.en: Master Program in Systems Biology and Bioinformatics, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: "以探索與慢性疾病相關的基因及其病理機制為主軸,至少探討三種不同的疾病為目標並利用小組討論激發深入了解研究內容以及訓練邏輯思考研究的問題及如何解決其問題並利用上台報告訓練其口說科學研究的能力"
goal.en: "The aim of this course is to assist students to get insights into chronic diseases. From the molecular biology views, the class will focus on understanding the mechanisms of chronic disease. At least three different chronic disease will be discussed in this course. With group discussion, students will be able to improve their logical thinking and ability in problem-solving. In addition, students could also develop their scientific communication and research abilities via oral presentation."
